TopicTitle: Showing rockets' weight in building mode

Articles.Content:
I would suggest showing the mass of your rocket/stage in the VAB, because it is really annoying to check how much your rocket/stage weighs by launching the rocket over and over again.

PS: Sorry in advance for any grammar fails/typos

Edited April 12, 2014 by MrBainus

Umm, not really weight, but mass.

And yeah, everyone pretty much wants that.
